# selectedRanges

**Instance Property**

The current selected ranges.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor final var selectedRanges: [Range<String.Index>] { get set }
```

## Managing text selection

- **resetSelection()**: Removes a person’s text selection from the interface.
